text:
The department of Arts and Culture has scheduled to organise a district-level cultural events at the Government Music School at Kattigaanpalli near here on February 10.

The competitions organised through the department’s Jawahar Youth Clubs will include Bharathanatyam, vocals, painting, and folk dance for students from classes 6 to 11. The contests will commence at 10 a.m. on the aforementioned date. Winners of the district level contest will qualify for the State level contest. Further details may be ascertained over phone on 04343-234 001.
title: Competitions
